name: 7 Days Of Week for Toddlers,Kids and Pre-School Babies-A toddler calendar learning app
name_original: 7 Days Of Week for Toddlers,Kids and Pre-School Babies-A toddler calendar learning app
description:
7 Days Of The Week- Application that help your kids learn all 7 days of the week. This app will help your kids learn the name and pronunciation of each day.

Children can practice to learn days of week with beautiful flash cards. This is an ancient way to teach kids how to start learning days of week and is known to be most effective and proficient way.

indigo Apps are dedicated to updating our games regularly to make sure they deliver the very best gaming experience. If you have any issues to report or suggestions to make, please email the device you’re using, iOS version, and a detailed description of the problem to: indigoapps01@gmail.com

Love the app? Please take a minute out to write us a good review or if you are unhappy with anything, please leave feedback for us. We cannot have you unhappy. Can we?
